document_data.name: Forold
document_data.mainbody: '''Forold''' was a [[Purple Dragon Knight]], part of [[Azoun IV]]'s retinue in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: He served in [[Azoun IV]]'s personal retinue.
document_data.Relationships: In Azoun's personal retinue he served together with others including [[Daervin]] and [[Regrar]].
document_data.History: Forold was part of Azoun's retinue in late {{yearlink|1357}}, during the king's visit to [[Tessaril Winter]] in [[Eveningstar]] after the departure of [[Shandril Shessair]]. While burying Daervin after the attack of a [[malaugrym]], Forold related something that a contact of theirs, [[Delmar]], had said about the events in Eveningstar prior to their arrival. He also had suspicions of his own regarding Tessaril.
